Key Match Events: Gavin Williams allowed one run in seven innings
Lane Thomas and Josh Naylor both hit two-run homers
Pre-Game Insights: Finding a way to win this series would be huge in the effort to put an end to the Royals' playoff hopes
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians bullpen was good as usual, with Cade Smith allowing a double that scored
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians extended their division lead to 4.5 games over Kansas City and 3.5 over Minnesota
Steven Kwan is still lost at the plate and is the last key offensive piece who needs to fall into place for a strong run to and through the playoffs
Others: Tommy Pham tried to injure Josh Naylor
